_note: This is SOURCE DATA for import, not a direct database dump. The sync script (lib/jobs/sync-agency-catalogs.server.ts) transforms this into agency_course_templates records by: (1) Looking up agencyId from certification_agencies where code='padi', (2) Mapping levelCode to levelId via certification_levels lookup, (3) Generating contentHash from course fields, (4) Adding sourceType='static_json', timestamps, etc. Tenant-specific fields (price, isActive, etc.) are NOT in this file - they're set when tenants import courses.

courses.name: Open Water Diver
courses.description: The PADI Open Water Diver course is the world's most popular scuba course. Learn to dive in a relaxed, supportive environment with comprehensive training.

courses.name: Advanced Open Water Diver
courses.description: Take your diving to the next level with adventure dives including deep diving and underwater navigation, plus three specialty dives of your choice.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Open Water Diver or equivalent
courses.medicalRequirements: Current medical clearance if over 45 or with medical conditions

courses.name: Rescue Diver
courses.description: Learn to prevent and manage dive emergencies. Develop skills to help other divers and respond to diving accidents.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Advanced Open Water Diver and Emergency First Response (EFR) certification within 24 months

courses.name: Divemaster
courses.description: The first professional level in the PADI system. Learn to supervise dive activities and assist instructors with student divers.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Rescue Diver, 40+ logged dives, EFR certification within 24 months, 18 years old
requiredItems: Pocket mask and oxygen unit (for training)

courses.name: Enriched Air (Nitrox) Diver
courses.description: Learn to dive with enriched air nitrox, extending your no-decompression limits and shortening surface intervals.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Open Water Diver or equivalent
